title: Stylish Brisbane Mantra City Break in South Bank with Heated Lap Pool
description:
Experience the vibrant energy of Queensland's capital with a stylish self-contained stay perfectly positioned in the heart of the city's cultural precinct. The hotel is just steps from the South Bank Parklands, home to lush gardens, riverside promenades and the celebrated Queensland Art Gallery and the Gallery of Modern Art.

After a day of exploration, dive into the hotel's heated lap pool, work up an appetite in the fully-equipped gym or savour local flavours at the onsite Ovello Bar & Kitchen. Venture further afield to explore the eclectic West End, renowned for its fusion of cultures, live music, and trendy boutiques before retreating to your stylish room for a restful night's sleep.
offer_address: 161 Grey Street, South Bank, South Bank, Australia, 4101
